com.google.zxing.web

Class DecodeServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.google.zxing.web.DecodeServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public final class DecodeServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    HttpServlet which decodes images containing barcodes. Given a URL, it will retrieve the image and decode it. It can also process image files uploaded via POST.
    Author:
    Sean Owen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
